body.p: 1. Descendant of Jacob through Asher and Beriah (Gn 46:17) and father of the family of Heberites (Nm 26:45; 1 Chr 7:31-32).
2. Husband of Jael, the woman who deceptively killed Sisera, known as Heber the Kenite (Jgs 4:11-21; 5:24).
3. Judahite, Mered’s son and the father of Soco (1 Chr 4:18).
4. Elpaal’s son from Judah’s tribe (1 Chr 8:17).
5. KJV spelling for Eber in 1 Chronicles 5:13; 8:22; and Luke 3:35. See Eber #1, #2, #4.
